mapper.select:
SELECT u.`id`, u.`username`, u.`bid`, u.`email`, u.`name`, u.`status`, u.`usertype`, u.`gender`, u.`mobile`, DATE_FORMAT (u.`adddate`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ADDDATE FROM s_user u
u.isdel = 0
and u.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and u.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
and u.usertype like concat('%',#{usertype},'%')
order by u.adddate desc
limit #{begin},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_user (id, username, PASSWORD, NAME, gender, mobile, email, usertype, bid, ADDDATE) VALUES (UUID(), #{username}, md5(#{password}), #{name}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{usertype}, #{bid}, now())
